scripts.compile: npm run clean && mkdir -p compiled && npm run compile:server && npm run compile:client
scripts.compile:server: mkdir -p compiled/server && npm run compile:server-cpp && npm run compile:server-asmjs && npm run compile:server-wasm
scripts.compile:server-cpp: emcc -O3 -Wall -Werror --bind src/server/index.cpp -o compiled/server/app.bc && emcc -O3 -Wall -Werror --bind src/server/index.cpp -o compiled/server/app.o
scripts.compile:server-asmjs: mkdir -p compiled/server/asmjs && emcc -O3 --bind --memory-init-file 0 --llvm-lto 3 --llvm-opts 3 --js-opts 1 --closure 1 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s "EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=['UTF8ToString']" -s AGGRESSIVE_VARIABLE_ELIMINATION=1 -s ELIMINATE_DUPLICATE_FUNCTIONS=1 -s ABORTING_MALLOC=1 -s NO_EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -s NO_FILESYSTEM=1 -s DISABLE_EXCEPTION_CATCHING=2 compiled/server/app.bc -o compiled/server/asmjs/app.asm.js
scripts.compile:server-wasm: mkdir -p compiled/server/wasm && emcc -O3 --bind --memory-init-file 0 --llvm-lto 3 --llvm-opts 3 --js-opts 1 --closure 1 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s "EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=['UTF8ToString']" -s AGGRESSIVE_VARIABLE_ELIMINATION=1 -s ABORTING_MALLOC=1 -s NO_EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -s NO_FILESYSTEM=1 -s DISABLE_EXCEPTION_CATCHING=2 -s BINARYEN=1 -s "BINARYEN_TRAP_MODE='allow'" compiled/server/app.bc -o compiled/server/wasm/app.js
scripts.compile:client: mkdir -p compiled/client && npm run compile:client-cpp && npm run compile:client-asmjs && npm run compile:client-wasm
scripts.compile:client-cpp: emcc -O3 -Wall -Werror --bind src/client/index.cpp -o compiled/client/app.bc && emcc -O3 -Wall -Werror --bind src/client/index.cpp -o compiled/client/app.o
scripts.compile:client-asmjs: mkdir -p compiled/client/asmjs && emcc -O3 --bind --memory-init-file 0 --llvm-lto 3 --llvm-opts 3 --js-opts 1 --closure 1 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s "EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=['UTF8ToString']" -s AGGRESSIVE_VARIABLE_ELIMINATION=1 -s ELIMINATE_DUPLICATE_FUNCTIONS=1 -s ABORTING_MALLOC=1 -s NO_EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -s NO_FILESYSTEM=1 -s DISABLE_EXCEPTION_CATCHING=2 compiled/client/app.bc -o compiled/client/asmjs/app.asm.js
scripts.compile:client-wasm: mkdir -p compiled/client/wasm && emcc -O3 --bind --memory-init-file 0 --llvm-lto 3 --llvm-opts 3 --js-opts 1 --closure 1 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s "EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=['UTF8ToString']" -s AGGRESSIVE_VARIABLE_ELIMINATION=1 -s ABORTING_MALLOC=1 -s NO_EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -s NO_FILESYSTEM=1 -s DISABLE_EXCEPTION_CATCHING=2 -s BINARYEN=1 -s "BINARYEN_TRAP_MODE='allow'" compiled/client/app.bc -o compiled/client/wasm/app.js
scripts.build:debug: npm run compile && npm run build:webpack -- --env.server && npm run build:webpack
scripts.build:prod: npm run compile && npm run build:webpack -- --env.prod --env.server && npm run build:webpack -- --env.prod
